column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I have a very important job interview coming up in a few days and I want to make sure I look my best .
#id=2
#text=I called up my barber and made an appointment for later on in the day .
#id=3
#text=When I got to the barber shop I greeted him and took a seat in his chair .
#id=4
#text=I told him about the interview and he told me not to worry I was in good hands .
#id=5
#text=He put the barber apron over me so I would n't get any hair on my clothes while he cut my hair .
#id=6
#text=He took out his scissors and started sniping away like he usually did .
#id=7
#text=After about 20 minutes we were all done .
#id=8
#text=He took out a small mirror and showed me the front and back of my new haircut .
#id=9
#text=As always I was very satisfied with his work .
#text=He dusted off the loose hair and removed the apron as I got up .
#text=I paid him and gave him a nice tip for a job well done .
#text=Before leaving he wished me good luck on my interview and thanked me for stopping by .
